A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I signed up to make this review because I can't for the life of me understand the audience score for this movie.  I grew up loving Star Wars.  I thought Rogue One was a great and The Force Awakens was a good movie.  I am not a fanboy who just loves everything with the Star Wars name slapped on it but this movie is better than OK.  It is a good movie just on the merit of the movie.  Subtract the franchize\, and the fact that this movie was clearly made by someone who loves Star Wars it stands as a good movie.  There were times I could tell I was being emotionally manipulated but despite seeing the path I was being lead down I enjoyed the ride.   The movie was a fun and exciting ride.  I can see how it may not be what people expected but that doesn't make it a bad movie.  I have looked at the bad reviews and I am not sure we saw the same movie.  Maybe this is a love it or hate it kind of movie but for me I loved it.  There were minor issues I had with the movie but nothing that ruined the fun of the movie.
